objectives: Students will discuss technology in daily life using Neutral/Standard register language
Students will engage with Thriller/Suspense themed scenarios related to technology in daily life
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of neutral level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining technology in daily life content with Thriller/Suspense narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore technology in daily life through a Thriller/Suspense lens using Neutral/Standard language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a dangerous or threatening situation involving technology in daily life

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice neutral register vocabulary related to technology in daily life in a thriller context
Students engage in thriller themed role-play about technology in daily life using neutral register
Students create original thriller themed content about technology in daily life in neutral register

discussion_questions: How would you describe technology in daily life in a Thriller/Suspense scenario?
What suspense or threat might be involved in technology in daily life?
Can you create a Thriller/Suspense story about technology in daily life?
How does technology in daily life change when viewed through a Thriller/Suspense perspective?
What neutral register expressions would you use to discuss this thriller scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Thriller/Suspense situation involving technology in daily life
roles: Character A: Using neutral register in thriller context
Character B: Responding in neutral register within thriller theme

topic_genre_blend: technology in daily life with suspense
technology in daily life with threat
technology in daily life with danger

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Neutral/Standard throughout: Standard professional communication
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Thriller/Suspense theme: Tension, danger, psychological intensity

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Neutral/Standard register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Thriller/Suspense themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of neutral register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
